reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here on route to Germany and were looking for somewhere convenient and just off the motorway. In this respect, the hotel is fine. The rooms were basic but modern. One thing let the whole thing down though, there was an overwhelming smell of cigarettes in what was supposed to be a non-smoking room. There was also no lift and having to lug 2 heavy suitcases up 3 flights of stairs was not fun. On the plus side, it was cheap. You usually get what you pay for and in this case it was true. But the stale stench of cigarettes was unacceptable.
reviews.title: Good price, shame about the smell
Frothy water
reviews.text: Arrived on a hot and humid night. Only way of getting ventilation was to open the window, which removes all privacy. Couldn't sleep properly because of heat. Not enough towels in room. In the morning the cold tap was dispensing violent frothy water... much much fizzier than soda water, and tasted of sea water. TV reception poor. Breakfast was clearly not worth seven euros, so we skipped it. Car park was fantastic.

reviews.title: Etap Hotel Liege
reviews.text: The Hotel was easy to find with our Tom Tom. A friendly young man was helping us at the desk and even spoke Dutch. The room was clean and exactly what you can expect from a Etap Hotel. The Hotel was outside of Liege so you need a car to visit the city. Nearby was a Mc Donalds. When in Liege we will certainly stay here again.

reviews.title: Good Location, efficient staff, clean...
reviews.text: Good overall service...Clean although there was a smell cigarretes, so they should be carefull about that if they have smoking floors or rooms and non smoking rooms...The internet service is good as well, the rooms are comfortable for people who are just passing by liege like we were to get to other countries the price quality relation is ghood

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: booked online in advance, paid EUR 39 per night. I stay often in Etap. Not much to complain about it. clean room with private shower and toilet. I think the hotel is just being renovated. the decoration looks new. with a LCD TV which you can input your video or audio to be display via the TV. the shower head was funny, when you turn on the water LED lights will come out. Toilet and the shower are separate, that is a plus.
reviews.title: Not much to complain

reviews.text: Hotel was easy to find, just next the the high way, there's a Mcdonald and Makro next to it.
reviews.title: Oops. Should have kept driving.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The airco was not really working well, the lobby has much colder air then the room. But we have a fan with us, so still ok for us.
reviews.title: Degoutant!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are looking for a budget room to stay with the cheap price, sure you can go here. But if you are looking for a hotel with luxury service and facilities, do go there.
reviews.title: Dirty!
